articles.author: Rebekah Valentine
articles.title: Activision QA Workers Vote to Form Largest US Video Game Worker Union to Date - IGN
articles.description: A group of roughly 600 quality assurance (QA) workers at Activision under Microsoft have successfully voted to unionize with the Communication Workers of America (CWA), becoming Activision Quality Assurance United.
